header: It's not often we get to mention Perl books here, and this week there are two stories related to Perl books: the 4th edition of the classic Modern Perl has been published by the Pragmatic Bookshelf, and the Dancer core team are running a kickstart campaign to fund production of a Dancer book.
Perl 6 is now officially in beta!
subject: Two perl books in the news!
